column5: Position of the center of the color measuring field in the coordinates of the MarkObject that contains this mark. If the measuring field is defined within a ColorControlStrip, @Center refers to the rectangle defined by @Center and @Size of the ColorControlStrip.
Percentage values for each separation. The number of array elements SHALL match the number of separations.
Screen ruling values in lines per inch for each separation. The number of array elements SHALL match the number of separations.
